sources.title: Digital Marketing Spend Report
key_findings: The average Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC) for digital businesses in Germany was €30 in 2024.
The CAC has been increasing at a rate of 5% annually.
sources.usage_note: This data can be used to estimate the budget required for customer acquisition for HappyNest.

sources.title: Customer Acquisition Cost in the Digital Age
key_findings: The average CAC for digital businesses in the EU was €25 in 2024.
There is a wide variation in CAC across different sectors, with the highest in finance and the lowest in entertainment.
sources.usage_note: This data can be used to compare the CAC of HappyNest with other digital businesses in the EU.

assumptions: The CAC for HappyNest will be similar to the average CAC for digital businesses in the EU and Germany.
